name: CoachAI Balanced
philosophy: Balanced, age-appropriate development across moments of the game.

agePolicies.U9-U10: Simple cues, lots of games, constrained decisions.

sessionGuidelines.main: 2–3 constrained game blocks aligned to the focus.

prompts.planningNotes: Favor realism and repetitions. Tie each block to 1–2 clear principles and one psych theme.
